column1:
In 
terms  of' Section  2  of  the  Law, 
the  Land  Reform  Commission  has  been
established  with the object of ensuring that no person  shall  own agricultural  land

in  excess  of  the  said  ceiling,  and 
to  take  over  agricultural 
land  owned  by  any

person  in  excess  of the  ceiling  and 
to  utilize  such 
land 
in  a  manner  which  will

result  in  an 
increase  in 
its  productivity  and  in  the  employment  generated  from
